name: keyforge-amasser
description: Sync KeyForge decks from the Master Vault to Decks of KeyForge

scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run pack:chrome && npm run pack:firefox
scripts.pack:firefox: cp manifest.json manifest-v3.json && cp manifest-v2.json manifest.json && zip -r keyforge-amasser-firefox.zip dist manifest.json *.html *.css icons -x '*.git*' 'node_modules/*' '*.zip' 'package*.json' && mv manifest-v3.json manifest.json

author: David Mikalova
